content:
Hi everyone,

Google UX Research team is conducting a survey to better understand FHIR implementers' needs and challenges. We would like to invite you to complete an anonymous survey to share your experience working with FHIR. It should take no longer than 15 minutes to complete the survey.

Survey link: https://google.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_d43SPOXFAtQkhL0

Thank you for your consideration!

Cheers,
Leslie
